telegram_bypass.title: Telegram Bypass
telegram_bypass.description: Telegram may be blocked in your country or region. Use our free proxy server to access the messenger without restrictions. Just click the button below, and Telegram will automatically configure the proxy.
telegram_bypass.why_item1: Get access to Telegram if it's blocked in your country
telegram_bypass.why_item2: Fast and stable connection through our proxy server
telegram_bypass.why_item4: Automatic setup - just click the button
telegram_bypass.note: Note: If the button doesn't work, open this page in your mobile device's browser and click the button again.
telegram_bypass.hero_description: Configure a proxy server in Telegram to access the messenger on all devices. We provide free proxy servers for all users.
telegram_bypass.instructions_description: Select your device and follow the step-by-step instructions:
telegram_bypass.ios_step1: Open the Telegram app on your iPhone or iPad
telegram_bypass.ios_step2: Go to Settings ‚Üí Data and Storage
telegram_bypass.ios_step3: Scroll down to the "Proxy" section (Proxy Settings)
telegram_bypass.ios_step6: Enter proxy server details and tap "Save"
telegram_bypass.android_step1: Open the Telegram app on your Android device
telegram_bypass.android_step2: Tap the three lines (menu) in the top left corner
telegram_bypass.android_step3: Go to Settings ‚Üí Data and Storage
telegram_bypass.android_step4: Scroll down to the "Proxy" section (Proxy Settings)
telegram_bypass.android_step7: Enter proxy server details and tap "Save"
telegram_bypass.windows_step2: Click the three lines (menu) in the top left corner
telegram_bypass.windows_step7: Enter proxy server details and click "Save"
telegram_bypass.macos_step2: In the Telegram menu, select Telegram ‚Üí Settings
telegram_bypass.macos_step7: Enter proxy server details and click "Save"
telegram_bypass.linux_step2: Click the three lines (menu) in the top left corner
telegram_bypass.linux_step7: Enter proxy server details and click "Save"
telegram_bypass.info_item1: Proxy servers are provided free of charge to all StealthNET users
telegram_bypass.info_item2: It is recommended to use SOCKS5 for better performance
telegram_bypass.info_item3: After configuring the proxy, all Telegram connections will go through our server
telegram_bypass.info_item4: If the proxy doesn't work, try switching to another type (SOCKS5 ‚Üî HTTP)
